title: S+ on Kassadin and i get NOTHING :(
body:
Can anyone explain how it all works:
Q;
Are some characters are different to others?
How can i tell?

-I get M3 on Nidalee and win S- and her loot crate.

-M4 on Lux and S and her loot crate.

-M4 on Kassadin S+ and i get NOTHING :(

ALSO with Kassadin it wont update his A- to S+ ... is this a bug?

replies.body: Im with you, i also posted a thread on here for the same problem, I suggest looking at your collection and make sure no other champions are not receiving a score. I have reported twice on bug reports and posted here still no comment from a rito employee

In order to get the loot crate for a champion you have to:
a) own the champion
b) have a loot crate available to be earned (checked on profile tab on client, the lttle box with a plus beside it under your summoner name)
c) Not have already recieved a crate for that champion (checked via the "collections" tab in client, champions with a gold border around them have already had this seasons chest earned and you cannot earn more). 

Perhaps it is one of these reasons?
